meanings.sent1: The doctor cholecystectomized the patient to alleviate the pain.
meanings.sent2: After the surgery, the gallbladder was cholecystectomized successfully.
meanings.sent3: The gallbladder felt relieved after being cholecystectomized by the skilled surgeon.
meanings.sent4: The removal of the gallbladder cholecystectomized the patient's discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The surgical team cholecystectomized the problematic gallbladder with precision.

meanings.definition: Having undergone a surgical procedure to remove the gallbladder.
meanings.sent1: The cholecystectomized patient followed the post-operative instructions carefully.
meanings.sent2: She felt much better after becoming cholecystectomized.
meanings.sent3: The cholecystectomized individual had a newfound appreciation for a healthy diet.
meanings.sent4: His cholecystectomized status made him more cautious about fatty foods.
meanings.sent5: The cholecystectomized man embraced a gallbladder-free lifestyle.
